iabs.name: iabs
iabs.description: convert signed to unsigned by taking absolute value

iadd.name: iadd
iadd.description: addition modulo 2^N (signed and unsigned versions are the same op)

idiv_checked_s.name: idiv_checked_s
idiv_checked_s.description: as idivmod_checked_s but discarding the second output

idiv_checked_u.name: idiv_checked_u
idiv_checked_u.description: as idivmod_checked_u but discarding the second output

idiv_s.name: idiv_s
idiv_s.description: as idivmod_s but discarding the second output

idiv_u.name: idiv_u
idiv_u.description: as idivmod_u but discarding the second output

idivmod_checked_s.name: idivmod_checked_s
idivmod_checked_s.description: given signed integer -2^{N-1} <= n < 2^{N-1} and unsigned 0 <= m < 2^N, generates signed q and unsigned r where q*m+r=n, 0<=r<m (m=0 is an error)

idivmod_checked_u.name: idivmod_checked_u
idivmod_checked_u.description: given unsigned integers 0 <= n < 2^N, 0 <= m < 2^N, generates unsigned q, r where q*m+r=n, 0<=r<m (m=0 is an error)

idivmod_s.name: idivmod_s
idivmod_s.description: given signed integer -2^{N-1} <= n < 2^{N-1} and unsigned 0 <= m < 2^N, generates signed q and unsigned r where q*m+r=n, 0<=r<m (m=0 will call panic)

idivmod_u.name: idivmod_u
idivmod_u.description: given unsigned integers 0 <= n < 2^N, 0 <= m < 2^N, generates unsigned q, r where q*m+r=n, 0<=r<m (m=0 will call panic)

ige_s.name: ige_s
ige_s.description: "greater than or equal" as signed integers

ige_u.name: ige_u
ige_u.description: "greater than or equal" as unsigned integers

ile_s.name: ile_s
ile_s.description: "less than or equal" as signed integers

ile_u.name: ile_u
ile_u.description: "less than or equal" as unsigned integers

imod_checked_s.name: imod_checked_s
imod_checked_s.description: as idivmod_checked_s but discarding the first output

imod_checked_u.name: imod_checked_u
imod_checked_u.description: as idivmod_checked_u but discarding the first output

imod_s.name: imod_s
imod_s.description: as idivmod_s but discarding the first output

imod_u.name: imod_u
imod_u.description: as idivmod_u but discarding the first output

imul.name: imul
imul.description: multiplication modulo 2^N (signed and unsigned versions are the same op)

inarrow_s.name: inarrow_s
inarrow_s.description: narrow a signed integer to a narrower one with the same value if possible

inarrow_u.name: inarrow_u
inarrow_u.description: narrow an unsigned integer to a narrower one with the same value if possible

ineg.name: ineg
ineg.description: negation modulo 2^N (signed and unsigned versions are the same op)

ipow.name: ipow
ipow.description: raise first input to the power of second input, the exponent is treated as an unsigned integer

irotl.name: irotl
irotl.description: rotate first input left by k bits where k is unsigned interpretation of second input (leftmost bits replace rightmost bits)

irotr.name: irotr
irotr.description: rotate first input right by k bits where k is unsigned interpretation of second input (rightmost bits replace leftmost bits)

is_to_u.name: is_to_u
is_to_u.description: convert signed to unsigned by taking absolute value

ishl.name: ishl
ishl.description: shift first input left by k bits where k is unsigned interpretation of second input (leftmost bits dropped, rightmost bits set to zero

ishr.name: ishr
ishr.description: shift first input right by k bits where k is unsigned interpretation of second input (rightmost bits dropped, leftmost bits set to zero)

isub.name: isub
isub.description: subtraction modulo 2^N (signed and unsigned versions are the same op)

iu_to_s.name: iu_to_s
iu_to_s.description: convert unsigned to signed by taking absolute value

iwiden_s.name: iwiden_s
iwiden_s.description: widen a signed integer to a wider one with the same value

iwiden_u.name: iwiden_u
iwiden_u.description: widen an unsigned integer to a wider one with the same value
